hero.title: Create Amazing Slides
hero.subtitle: Transform your ideas into beautiful presentations with AI

placeholder.idea: Enter your PPT idea in one sentence...
placeholder.outline: Paste or enter your outline content...
placeholder.description: Paste or enter detailed page descriptions...

description.idea: Describe your idea and let AI generate the complete PPT structure
description.outline: Provide an outline and AI will expand each point into detailed slides
description.description: Provide detailed descriptions and AI will create slides directly

template.stylePlaceholder: Describe your desired style, e.g.: Modern minimalist style with blue tones, professional business presentation...
template.styleTip: Style descriptions will guide AI in generating slides with consistent visual style

error.imageUploadNoInfo: Image uploaded but no URL returned
error.fileUploadNoInfo: File uploaded but no info returned

tip.pptToPdf: Tip: Converting PPT to PDF first may improve parsing quality

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure your AI and application preferences

aiProviderFormat.label: AI Provider Format
aiProviderFormat.description: Select the API format for your AI provider

apiBaseUrl.label: API Base URL
apiBaseUrl.description: The base URL for API requests

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.placeholder: Enter new API key to update
apiKey.description: Your API key will be encrypted and stored securely

mineruApiBase.label: MinerU API Base
mineruApiBase.description: API endpoint for MinerU document parsing

maxDescriptionWorkers.label: Max Description Workers
maxDescriptionWorkers.description: Maximum concurrent workers for description generation (1-20)

maxImageWorkers.label: Max Image Workers
maxImageWorkers.description: Maximum concurrent workers for image generation (1-20)

confirm.resetMessage: This will reset all settings to their default values. Are you sure?

apiKeyHint.prefix: Need an API key? Get one from

outline.title: Edit Outline
outline.noPagesHint: Click "Add Page" to create manually, or "Auto Generate Outline" to let AI do it for you
outline.selectCardHint: Click a card on the left to view details

confirm.regenerateMessage: Existing outline content will be overwritten. Are you sure you want to continue?

aiRefine.placeholder: e.g.: Add a page about XXX, delete page 3, merge first two pages... - Ctrl+Enter to submit
aiRefine.error: Modification failed, please try again later

detail.title: Edit Page Descriptions
detail.noPagesHint: Please go back to outline editor to add pages first
detail.aiRefinePlaceholder: e.g.: Make descriptions more detailed, delete a point from page 2, emphasize the importance of XXX... - Ctrl+Enter to submit
detail.aiRefinePlaceholderMobile: e.g.: Make descriptions more detailed... - Ctrl+Enter
detail.confirmRegenerate: Some pages already have descriptions. Regenerating will overwrite them. Continue?
detail.confirmRegeneratePage: This page already has a description. Regenerating will overwrite current content. Continue?
detail.refineFailed: Modification failed, please try again later

history.title: History
history.subtitle: View and manage all your projects
history.emptyHint: Create your first project to get started
history.deletedCurrentProject: Deleted project, including the currently open project
history.confirmDeleteSingle: Are you sure you want to delete "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone.
history.confirmDeleteBatch: Are you sure you want to delete {{count}} selected project(s)? This action cannot be undone.

preview.title: Preview
preview.noPagesDesc: Please go back to edit page and add content first
preview.editInstructionLabel: Enter edit instructions (page description will be auto-added)
preview.editInstructionPlaceholder: e.g.: Remove selected area elements, change background to blue, increase title font size, change text box style to dashed...
preview.templateSelectDesc: Select a new template to apply to future PPT pages (existing pages won't be affected). You can choose preset templates, existing templates, or upload new ones.

confirm.regenerateAll: This will regenerate all pages (history will be preserved). Are you sure?
confirm.regenerateSelected: This will regenerate {{count}} selected pages (history will be preserved). Are you sure?

toast.alreadyGenerating: This page is already being generated, please wait...
toast.regionAdded: Selected region added as reference image. You can view and remove it in "Upload Images" below
toast.cropFailed: Cannot crop from current image (browser security restriction). Try uploading reference images manually.
toast.exportStarted: Export task started. Check progress in export tasks panel
toast.refreshFailed: Refresh failed, please try again later
